text: Yeh badwi (Bedouins) kehte hain ke “hum imaan laye” insey kaho: “tum imaan nahin laye, balke yun kaho ke hum muti (submissive) ho gaye” imaan abhi tumhare dilon mein daakhil nahin hua hai. Agar tum Allah aur uske Rasool ki farmabardari ikhtiyar karlo to woh tumhare amal ke ajr mein koi kami na karega.Yakeenan Allah bada darguzar karne wala aur Raheem hai
